amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: SEC.___. None of these funds made available by this Act may be used by the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) to redesign the Phoenix Metroplex regional airspace.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds by the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) to redesign the Phoenix Metroplex regional airspace.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A051) offered by Mr. Gallego.
